TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed UriPartial extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Defines the parts of a URI for the <xref:System.Uri.GetLeftPart%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The UriPartial enumeration defines the values that can be passed to the <xref:System.Uri.GetLeftPart%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.UriPartial Authority = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The scheme and authority segments of the URI.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.UriPartial Path = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The scheme, authority, and path segments of the URI.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.UriPartial Query = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The scheme, authority, path, and query segments of the URI.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.UriPartial Scheme = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The scheme segment of the URI.
